subject: Olympic Games (2008)
lead_paragraph: Dathan Ritzenhein, who set a Central Park record a year ago in the Healthy Kidney 10k, withdrew Thursday from this year’s race on May 17. He said an injury to his left foot had kept him from racing for 13 weeks and had set back his training for the marathon in this summer’s Beijing Olympics.
